pageContext.description: APPEARING UNDER COMPOSITION, BUT REALLY DESCRIPTION:, Formed of a bar of diamond section, the ends tapering or curling over the widest part of loop;surface undecorated.
pageContext.other: 3-part, hand-drawn illustration.  2 parts are drawn over white-out label, which only partially obscures original illustration., NOTATION IN PENCIL:  1903. 6.25.1, NOTATION ON WHITE-OUT LABEL:, 1903 6-25  102.,  Found about 1896, 5' below ....,  S.E. of Hollingby Castle (now 13 ..., ALSO PUBLICATION INFO, NOTED ABOVE., In the TITLE, the word "Bracelet" has been added in different ink and handwriting., SITE info has been tweaked to add:, East [AFTER SUSSEX] and,  (near)  [IN PENCIL, AFTER Brighton]
pageContext.composition: Formed of a bar of diamond section, the ends tapering or curling over the widest part of loop;surface undecorated.
pageContext.collection: British Museum.  1903-6.25.      1., Purchased from W. T. Ready, 55 Rathbone Place,,         1903.
pageContext.site: England, Sussex East, Brighton (near), on Downs, 1 mile S-E of Hollingbury Castle (now 133 Bonchurch Road), 5 feet below surface, about 1896,
